hero.description: Frontend-focused Fullstack developer specialized in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and React Native. I build scalable, high-performance web and mobile applications with clean code, strong UX, and production-ready engineering practices.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.description: Technologies and tools I use to build scalable and modern applications.

technologies.react: Modern UI library for building interactive components
technologies.reactNative: Framework for building native mobile apps using React
technologies.next: Full-stack framework for optimized web applications
technologies.typescript: Strongly typed JavaScript for safer and scalable code
technologies.javascript: Core programming language of modern web applications
technologies.node: JavaScript runtime for backend and server development
technologies.express: Minimalist web framework for Node.js applications
technologies.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development
technologies.framer: Animation library for building smooth UI interactions
technologies.mongodb: NoSQL document-oriented database for storing and managing scalable, flexible data
technologies.git: Version control system for collaboration and code tracking

timeline.title: Professional Journey
timeline.description: Developing modern web applications with measurable performance improvements and strong collaboration with product teams.

experiences.title: Frontend React Developer
experiences.description: Developed high-performance web interfaces using React and TypeScript. Improved page performance by 30%, built reusable UI components, integrated REST APIs, and implemented Docker-based development environments.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Built responsive and scalable React applications, created reusable UI components, managed state using Redux, and improved application reliability by reducing critical bugs by 20%.

experiences.title: Fullstack JavaScript Developer Intern
experiences.description: Designed and developed a complete e-commerce platform using React.js for frontend and Node.js/Express for backend. Implemented unit testing with Jest to ensure application stability. Optimized state management using Redux, reducing unnecessary re-renders by 25%, and collaborated using Git workflows and code reviews.

about.title: How I Engineer Frontend Applications
about.description: I combine modern frameworks, scalable architecture, and performance-driven practices to deliver reliable and maintainable applications.

expertise.performanceDesc: Improving Core Web Vitals, optimizing rendering performance, lazy loading, and efficient state management using Redux, Zustand, and React Query.
expertise.accessibilityDesc: Building inclusive and user-friendly interfaces using semantic HTML, accessibility standards, and strong UX principles.
expertise.designDesc: Translating Figma and UI designs into scalable and reusable component systems using Tailwind CSS and modern design patterns.
